name: AVONFLOW
0:
”Alexa,turn on the thermostats”
”Alexa,turn off the thermostats”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Avonflow is a researcher and manufacturer of home appliances , the thermostats is Avonflow’s hardware. You can control the electric fireplace by Echo. For example, you can say: Alexa, start the fireplace, turn on the flame brightness, and turn the timer on, etc.
